title: Diary Of A Broken Doll 3: A Tale of Drugs, Lust, and Betrayal
description: Flyy Girl meets The Coldest Winter Ever with a dramatic modern twist. A compelling tale of love, drugs, and betrayal. Life seemed to be headed in the right direction for Courtney Johnson. She was about to start a new career (legit or not) , the relationship between her and Drew couldn’t possibly be going any better, and amazingly she was bonding with Drew’s secret son Ahmaad. With Drew on her side, Courtney was always confident that everything would work in her favor.Everything might have been going right for Courtney, but there were still things that plagued her. Would she ever find out the truth about her conception? Could she ever forgive her mother for her constant betrayal?When Drew faces the tragedy of a lifetime, Courtney takes on the ultimate task of stepping in saving the man that always had to save her.
author: Tatum James
